Disp_next1: About Scott Electric and Welcome to Training

SelectionTitle: S001. About Scott Electric and Welcome to Training
Title: S001. About Scott Electric and Welcome to Training
Title_short: About Scott Electric and Welcome to Training
Narr1: Scott Electric is a leading independent wholesale electrical distributor, serving electrical, mechanical, and general contractors, industrial customers, government agencies, and retail partners.
Narr2: Scott Electric is a leading independent wholesale electrical distributor, serving electrical, mechanical, and general contractors, industrial customers, government agencies, and retail partners.
Narr3:
Scott Electric is a leading independent wholesale electrical distributor, serving electrical, mechanical, and general contractors, industrial customers, government agencies, and retail partners. The company provides a broad range of electrical products, lighting, tools, and related services to support both day-to-day operations and long-term projects.

Welcome to the Scott Electric Training SiteWelcome to the Scott Electric Training Site. This platform is designed to help you build the knowledge and skills needed to support our customers safely, accurately, and efficiently. Here you will find guided learning, reference materials, and role-based courses aligned with how we work every day - in sales, operations, service, administration, and support.Thank you for investing your time in training. Your commitment to learning and improvement is an important part of keeping Scott Electric strong, responsive, and customer-focused.
Disp_next1: Quote to Cash Work Flow At SE Electrical Distribution

SelectionTitle: S002.  Quote to Cash Work Flow At SE Electrical Distribution
Title: S002. Quote to Cash Work Flow At SE Electrical Distribution
Title_short: Quote to Cash Work Flow At SE Electrical Distribution
Narr1: This site is a typical Quote to cache representation in what is called a workflow
Narr2: This site is a typical Quote to cache representation in what is called a workflow
Narr3: This site is a typical Quote to cache representation in what is called a workflow This outlines the various steps performed by various swim lanes if you will or functional groups and provides a overall picture of how we end up serving our customers and continuing to keep our creed of customer comes first
Disp_next1: Pictorial representation of Quote to Cash

SelectionTitle: S003.  Pictorial representation of  Quote to Cash  - At SE Electrical Distribution
Title: S003. Pictorial representation of Quote to Cash - At SE Electrical Distribution
Title_short: Pictorial representation of Quote to Cash
Narr1: This is the master slide for the Order to Pick process within the Quote to Cash Work Flow. It should be noted that these steps are performed by the Sales Personnel. The input to this starts when the customer indicates that they are ready accept a previously given quote or they send us a Purchase Order (PO) or they call into our sales force who always eager to assist them, the next step is S1. Where the sales person initiates / creates a new sales order by going to the menu, selecting sales , entry and sales order
Disp_next1: Sales Order to Pick SOP

SelectionTitle: M1.  Sales Order  to Pick SOP - At SE Electrical Distribution
Title: M1. Sales Order to Pick SOP - At SE Electrical Distribution
Title_short: Sales Order to Pick SOP
Narr1: The first step in the process of initiating a sales order this then leads to the next step which is an SOP in its own right "Enter Sales Order SOP"
Disp_next1: Initiate Sales order

SelectionTitle: S1. Initiate Sales order - Sales Order  to Pick SOP
Title: S1. Initiate Sales order - Sales Order to Pick SOP
Title_short: Initiate Sales order
Narr1: This is a SOP in itself as there are many ways to enter lines in a sales order starting with easy line entry, Shopping list entry etc
Disp_next1: Enter Order Lines

SelectionTitle: S2. Enter Order Lines  - Sales Order  to Pick SOP
Title: S2. Enter Order Lines - Sales Order to Pick SOP
Title_short: Enter Order Lines
Narr1: Then decision needs to be taken if this order or customer has any Add on charges etc that need to be processed at this time. The quest that is asked is Are their no Add on's a yes answer indicated that there are no add on and No answer indicates that there are add ons
Disp_next1: No  - Add-on ?- Sales Order to Pick SOP
UAP Label: Add Items Using Easy Line Entry

SelectionTitle: D1. No   - Add-on ?Sales Order  to Pick SOP
Title: D1. No "Add-on's" - Sales Order to Pick SOP
Title_short: No  - Add-on ?- Sales Order to Pick SOP
Deci_Question: Are there no Add on to add to this order?
Narr1: The user has Selected Yes to indicate that there are no Add ons to be processed for this order
Disp_next1: Yes There are no add on for this order
Disp_next2: No, There are "Add on" to add

SelectionTitle: Y1.  Yes - No Need  for  - Add-on ?Sales Order  to Pick SOP
Title: Y1. Yes - No Need for "Add-on's" - Sales Order to Pick SOP
Title_short: Yes There are no add on for this order
Narr1: Since all other information has been entered prior to this step it is time to check the totals and review the  Taxes
Disp_next1: Review Taxes and Totals

SelectionTitle: S3. Review Taxes and Totals  - Sales Order  to Pick SOP
Title: S3. Review Taxes and Totals - Sales Order to Pick SOP
Title_short: Review Taxes and Totals
Narr1: A decision has to be made whether this order is to billed on Account or if there is situation that it would be tendered or on Cash on Delivery basis. Hence the question No COD or Tendering needs to be asked and answered. A yes would indicate that this is not a tendered or COD sale. A no on the other hand would indicate that this order has to be processed as a tendered or COD Sale.
Disp_next1: No COD tendering ?
UAP Label: 02_Review Taxes, Totals, Payments for Stock Customer Sales Order

SelectionTitle: D2. No COD tendering ? - Sales Order  to Pick SOP
Title: D2. No COD tendering ? - Sales Order to Pick SOP
Title_short: No COD tendering ?
Deci_Question: This is an "On Account Customer" SO there is NO COD or Tendering
Narr1: Yes  - no COD Tendering
Disp_next1: Yes "no COD Tendering"
Disp_next2: No, This is a COD or Tendering Order

SelectionTitle: Y2. Yes  - no COD Tendering  - Sales Order  to Pick SOP
Title: Y2. Yes "no COD Tendering" - Sales Order to Pick SOP
Title_short: Yes "no COD Tendering"
Narr1: Finish Sales Order
Disp_next1: Finish Sales Order

Title: D5. Was Credit Restored or COD or CC accepted? - Sales Order to Pick SOP
